Pre-Game Insights: A Group D meeting between Brazil and Costa Rica, their first match in the 2024 Copa America, kicks off at 9:00 PM ET on June 24 at SoFi Stadium.
For this group-stage game, Brazil is -1111 to win and Costa Rica is +2200, with the draw at +1000.
An over/under of 3.5 goals (with the over at -110 and the under at -115) has been set for this match.
We are predicting Brazil to win, with a 91.7% chance of winning this match, based on the moneyline.
Brazil has scored 23 goals in 13 matches the past two years, and Costa Rica has conceded 27 goals in 14 matches.
Costa Rica has scored 19 goals in 14 games the past two years. On the flip side, Brazil has conceded 20 goals in 13 games.
In terms of goal differential, Brazil was in positive territory at +3. With 19 goals scored and 27 conceded, Costa Rica posted a negative goal differential.
